
How to use eGo?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Examples
========




Usage
=====

Text


**First**, First 

.. code-block:: python

    # make setting
    results = eGo(argd)


**Second**, get plots..

.. code-block:: python

    # Text Text
    results.plot()

--------------------------

Parameter Description                             Unit
========= ======================================= ====
xxxx       yyy                                    MW
